other_tests.findings: A heterozygous in-frame deletion of six nucleotides in exon 7 of RET (c.1512_1517delGGAGGG), resulting in a deletion of two amino acids (p.505_506del).
other_tests.changes_over_time: The RET p.505_506 deletion was noted to lead to ligand-independent autophosphorylation and increased activation of the MAPK/ERK and PI3K/AKT pathways, promoting cell proliferation.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed diagnosis of bilateral pheochromocytoma after bilateral adrenalectomy.
Showed a thyroid nodule with a diameter of 5 mm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Basal calcitonin, previously normal, was now mildly elevated at 7.9 pg/mL. After stimulation with pentagastrin, calcitonin increased to 492 pg/mL, suspecting MTC.

other_tests.findings: Histopathology confirmed a 4-mm medullary thyroid carcinoma (MTC) with stromal desmoplasia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-surgical follow-up indicated plasma metanephrines were within the normal range and serum calcitonin was nondetectable, indicating complete remission.
